title: Devils Postpile National Monument: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       There are no lodging options in Devils Postpile National Monument. Within the Reds Meadow Valley and a short drive from the monument, rustic cabins, bunks, and other amenities are available at the Reds Meadow Resort and Packstation. Reds Meadow Resort operates as a permittee of the Inyo National Forest. No other lodging is available in the valley.There are, however, seven campgrounds in the valley, including one at Devils Postpile. Many lodging options are available in the Town of Mammoth Lakes
